description: A front-end project focused on developing enterprise-grade AI chatbot applications with advanced Generative AI (Gen AI) features. I led the implementation of responsive and scalable UI components that enable intuitive user interactions. This application was tailored for enterprise needs, integrating robust API communication and real-time user feedback.

Tekos is a new startup in the form of a website application that will serve as a platform for Telkom University students to find accommodation after leaving the dormitory. Students can enjoy the convenience and assurance of having a place to live after the dormitory.

CineAnime is an anime website that serves as the ultimate haven for enthusiasts, offering a meticulously curated platform that lists a plethora of popular anime titles. It goes beyond being a mere directory, providing users with an intuitive search feature for detailed anime information, including plot summaries, character backgrounds, and user reviews. What sets CineAnime apart is its immersive trailer-watching experience, allowing users to preview the essence of each anime through high-quality trailers. Seamlessly combining a comprehensive listing, detailed information retrieval, and an enticing preview feature, CineAnime emerges as the go-to destination for anyone eager to explore, discover, and indulge in the captivating world of Japanese animation.

A modern, responsive company profile website built with Next.js, React, and Tailwind CSS. Features include hero section, services overview, project showcase, and contact form with email integration. Built mobile-first and SEO-optimized to strengthen Projected AI's brand presence and user engagement.

This portfolio showcases a project management web application developed for Adenco, an Australian company specializing in electrical and instrumentation contracting services across the mining and resources sector. The application includes features such as Daily Diaries for logging daily site activities, Project Setup for configuring WBS and project resources, and Contract IQ â€” a Generative AI-powered chatbot that enables users to ask questions and get insights about contract details. Built with React, Redux, and Tailwind CSS, the system delivers a responsive UI and efficient data handling through seamless API integration.
buildWith: Next.js, Redux, TypeScript, React, Tailwind CSS
